text: Perfect Strangers is a 2004 British romantic comedy film starring Rob Lowe and Anna Friel. ==Plot summary== Lloyd and Susie in London work for the same ad agency, but in different cities. An arrangement is made where they switch jobs and homes for a month. After settling into each other's place they consult each other by phone. It's not long before they fall in love. ==Cast== *Rob Lowe as Lloyd Rockwell *Anna Friel as Susie Wilding *Khandi Alexander as Christie Kaplan *Sarah Alexander as Alix Mason *Jennifer Baxter as Betsy *Gabriel Hogan as Harvey Truelove *Jane Luk as Dee Dee *Colin Fox as Sir Nigel *Katie Bergin as Kathy ==External links== * Category:2004 television films Category:2004 films Category:British films Category:British television films Category:2004 romantic comedy films Category:British romantic comedy films Category:CBS network films Category:Working Title Films films
